deleteAfterCopy.description: Paths relative to the destination root to delete after copying (for example: ".env" or "frontend/web/.next").

replacements.description: Text replacements to apply in common text files. Use {{NewProjectName}} and {{TemplateName}} in the 'to' value.

textExtensions.description: Extensions (like .md, .json) and/or exact file names (like README.md) that are safe for text replacement.
